Title: Java Full Stack Developer Role-Immediate Requirement- PAN India
Location: Noida, Vijayawada, Nagpur, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Gurgaon/Gurugram, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru
Description:
HCL Technologies is hiring for Java Full Stack Developer role. Thank you in advance for taking a look at the list of responsibilities and qualifications. We look forward to reviewing your resume.

Role: Java Full Stack
Minimum exp. Required: 7+ Years
Band: E2, E3
Designation: Tech Lead, SR Tech Lead, Project Lead.
Location: PAN India

Job Description:
Will be extremely hands on with design, development, unit test, build/deploy, operational support
Demonstrated experience in OOAD using established methodologies and notations such as UML and design patterns to create high and detailed level architecture and design.
Experience using standard frameworks like (not exhaustive and can change as new frameworks emerge and used) Java (Spring, SpringBatch, Maven, Jenkins, Junit, Log4J, Hibernate, MyBatis/iBatis, Code coverage tools etc.), JIRA, Database (SQL, Data Modeling), SOA etc.
Demonstrated experience with applications servers, development tools, build tools and configuration management practices.
Job Roles and responsibilities:
To be responsible for managing technology in projects and providing technical guidance / solutions for work completion.
To ensure process compliance in the assigned module, and participate in technical discussionsorreview as a technical consultant for feasibility study (technical alternatives, best packages, supporting architecture best practices, technical risks, breakdown into components, estimations).
To develop and guide the team members in enhancing their technical capabilities and increasing productivity
To prepare and submit status reports for minimizing exposure and risks on the project or closure of escalations.
To be responsible for providing technical guidance or solutions ;define, advocate, and implement best practices and coding standards for the team.

Title: Java Full Stack Developer
Location: Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru
Description:
At least 3-6 years of Work Experience in a similar role
Skills
Good knowledge of Java development
Good working knowledge of Spring MVC framework Springboot
Knowledge of Hibernate
Good exposure to JSP and servlets
Experience of developing in Angular - desirable but not mandatory
Good knowledge of Java Script, Jquery, HTML, CSS
Proficiency with database queries using SQL - knowledge of Hibernate an added advantage
Knowledge in one or many of the following Advanced Java areas:
Thread Concepts as well as Collection objects and classes, Socket Programming, event handling mechanisms, serialization
Core Java io or net packages
Stand alone real-time Java apps - these kind of apps would have used Advanced Java concepts
Experience in developing enterprise class applications / products
Willing to do hands-on development

You will be responsible for developing Java based applications using Spring and Hibernate
This will involve new feature development for Atos AIsaac CyberSecurity product line
You will be responsible for the design, development and testing of the features
The role involves development of the Java side of the application - you will thus be involved in developing the business logic layer and the database layer

Title: Java Full Stack Developer
Description:
Roles and Responsibilities

Become a go-to expert in the area of design, build, support of customer projects for the banking digital platform.
As an Intermediate consulting position, be able to operate independently with little assistance to provide quality work products to customers that comply with Oracle methodologies and practices.
Standard assignments are accomplished by exercising independent judgment, within defined policies and processes, to deliver functional and technical solutions on complex customer engagements

Desired Candidate Profile
FullStack software development role with 3-9 years of experience in the following:
Java JEE/Serverside development
Must have strong Technology experience in Java/J2EE ,JPA, Webservices(REST,SOAP) etc.
Developed applications using REST APIs with JSON payloads, Domain driven design or micro services architecture.
Experience in building highly secure APIs and web applications.
In depth understanding of Java Design patterns.
Experience working with popular frameworks like Spring etc.
Experience in building enterprise integrations using any Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) Platform


Javascript/User Experience ecosystem
Must have hands-on development experience in design and build of responsive UI using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript .
Expert skills in use of various JavaScript libraries like Angular JS, requireJS, nodeJS packages, jQuery and jQueryUI etc.
MVVM development experience using KnockoutJS or Angular.
Experience using JSON payloads and REST APIs.
Experience of Cordova for packaging and customizing hybrid mobile apps.
Experience in building workflows and complex UI component libraries.



Additional preferences
Experience in digital banking technology or fin-tech domain, experience on OBDX and OB API platforms is a definite plus.
Experience of working with Weblogic/Tomcat/JBoss application servers, Oracle database.
Good understanding of DevOps and automation concepts and experience of working in Agile projects.
Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate with various project stakeholders.
Strong Interpersonal skills with ability to maintaining good working relationships with customer or with Internal stakeholders.
Good understanding of android and iOS native code to supplement the Cordova apps.
Ability to lead technical teams towards positive outcomes.

Title: Digital Solutions - .Net Full Stack Developer (Angular)
Location: Kolkata, Mumbai, New Delhi, Hyderabad/Secunderabad, Pune, Chennai, Bangalore/Bengaluru
Description:
As part of a development team, the successful candidate will participate in developing and maintaining MVC/C#, .Net Core, AngularJS and Angular web applications.
Develops the solution for the software product in accordance with the solution architecture and technical roadmap.
Validates with the solution designers the implementation of new features.
Performs code review and applies good coding practices.
Assumes responsibility for the quality of the delivered code
Helps to eliminate technical obstacles raised by the team.
Works on functional and technical analysis as needed
Provides technical support/leadership for escalated incidents/faults to ensure they are resolved effectively.
Works with solution designers to ensure design will meet requirements.
Makes the best technical design decisions based on knowledge or in collaboration with the Technical Lead and/or Solution Architect.
Additional Job Description
Have a university degree in computer science or computer/software engineering or equivalent experience.
7+ years of knowledge and hands-on experience developing web applications with ASP.Net /C#/MVC, web services (WCF and REST), object-oriented design and microservices architecture.
Have between 3 and more years of knowledge and practical experience in the development of .Net Core applications.
5+ years of knowledge and practical experience with HTML4+/HTML5, CSS/Less, Javascript/JQuery, Ajax, DOM and Xml web standards is essential.
Have 5+ years of knowledge and practical experience with AngularJS and Angular.
Have a working knowledge of the Visual Studio 2019+/Git/Azure DevOps development environment.
Hands-on experience in an agile development environment.
